newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Bank Negara says to meet bank CEOs on Monday.
newsitem.headline: Bank Negara says to meet bank CEOs on Monday.

text.p: The Malaysian central bank said on Monday it will meet with the chief executive officers (CEOs) of domestic financial institutions on Monday to further discuss recently-issued guidelines on lending limits.
"We are calling them to further discuss the guidelines," a Bank Negara Malaysia spokesperson told Reuters.
Chief executives of commercial banks, merchant banks and finance houses were invited to the afternoon meeting, she said.
Bank Negara has been holding a few round of talks with bankers since issuing the guidelines at the release of its annual report on March 28.
The guidelines called for financial institutions to limit loans for the property sector and on share buying.
